ONE THE SQUARE_ TEMPLE QUAY_ BRISTOL - MEZZANINE FLOORPLAN

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: To Be Confirmed Upon Completion EPC

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
One The Square is located in the heart of the Temple Quay development which forms the main central office core of Bristol city centre and is a thriving business location just 2 minutes from Temple Meads rail station which provides a regular service to London Paddington, Cardiff, Birmingham and the south west. The property is also well located for both bus and road links being just off Temple Way which forms the main inner-city ring road and provides direct access to the M32.



The property comprises a high quality office on the three uppers floors with self-contained entrance plus ground floor retail providing excellent amenity such as a Starbucks coffee shop, Philpotts and a convenience store. The available accommodation is situated at first floor and mezzanine levels. The space will be subject to a comprehensive refurbishment.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Two Trinity Quay is situated on Avon Street in the Temple Quay area of Bristol city centre offering immediate access to Temple Way and the A4044 inner circuit ring road which connects to the M32 and the national motorway network. Temple Meads main line railway station is less than 5 minutes’ walk and provides direct services to London Paddington, the Midlands & South Wales. There is also an Ibis hotel close by and a range of amenities on the doorstep including Friska and Starbucks coffee shops, the Knights Templar pub and Veeno Italian restaurant.

The building is a modern 7 storey office building which has been fully refurbished to a high standard. The building benefits from a dual aspect double height ground floor manned reception, new male and female shower and changing facilities at ground floor level, basement car parking and is served by 5 passenger lifts.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
In an excellent working environment located at the top of Great George Street, the building is adjacent to Brandon Hill, close to Clifton, the City Centre and Harbourside. There are a range of cafés, restaurants and bars within easy walking distance on Park Street and all city centre amenities and public transport links are close by. The A4044 inner circuit ring road Temple Way connects the building to the M32 and the national motorway network.

31 Great George Street offers an inspiring, open-plan working environment with impressive reception, light atrium and modern sustainable features. A modern grade A office building comprising high-quality space over ground and 6 upper floors with basement and surface level car parking. Measuring 4,295 sq ft, the sixth floor offers occupiers flexible refurbished office space with extensive city and park views from the external balconies.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Brotherswood Court is situated on Almondsbury Business Park which is an established business park approximately 7 miles north of Bristol city centre and half a mile to the east of Aztec West Business Park. Other office occupiers on Almondsbury include RAC, Kerry Foods and Cemex. Access to junction 16 of the M5 is approximately 1 mile from Brotherswood Court and Bristol Parkway rail station is approximately 3 miles to the south. Parkway station has mainline services to London Paddington (fastest journey time 1hr 23 minutes). Brotherswood Court is a purpose-built office development which was developed around three existing farm buildings in the 1990's and comprises 8 offices buildings and a restaurant. The park stands out for its attractive and mature landscaping and use of reconstituted stone for the external elevations on the majority of the buildings. Laurel House provides accommodation over ground and first floors with the suites due to be refurbished to provide new carpets, decorations, new ceiling tiles and double glazing. The available accommodation is located on the ground floor.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Offices To Let In Attractive Business Park Location
